content:
The alienGreen is at the top left of the screen. I need to use my weapon to destroy it.
Action: 1

The alienGreen aliens are at the top and need to be taken care of. My avatar is on the left. I will shoot the aliens.
Action: 1

The aliens are spawning on the left. The avatar is at (10,0). There is a sam at (9,0) already. Let me shoot down the aliens at (0,0) and (0,1).
Action: 1
